entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow this morning and then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
